name: Large Bolstering Bubblebalm
description: When this card is drawn: Heal your active character for 3 HP. Create 1 Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm and insert it as the second card from the top of your opponent's deck.

descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When this card is drawn:</color> Heal your active character for 3 HP. Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> and insert it as the second card from the top of your opponent's deck.
